name: Gemini Deep Research Agent
tagline: The best research agent is open for devs
description: The Gemini Deep Research Agent is now available to developers via the Interactions API. Powered by Gemini 3.0 Pro, it autonomously plans, executes, and synthesizes multi-step research tasks.

name: Visual Editor
tagline: Edit web apps visually in the Cursor Browser
description: A new Visual Editor in the Cursor Browser that lets you edit web apps visually while the agent works alongside you to update code.

name: Korgi
tagline: AI-built project boards powered by your productivity stack
description: Korgi connects your scattered productivity stack in a single project management app. AI generates your project board with content, steps, and links in less than a minute. You take action while Korgi creates, shares, and launches assets in a click, using your own apps and drives (Google, Microsoft, Zoom, and more) ‚Äì with integrated chat and AI. Deliver finished boards as formatted files instantly. No more planning paralysis and hunting through files and tabs. Where is it? It's ON THE BOARD.

name: Kaily
tagline: AI agent that helps, solves, and closes. All day, every day
description: Meet Kaily, your AI teammate that automates every customer conversation. Handle support, sales, onboarding, bookings, and more across web, mobile, WhatsApp, Slack, email, voice, and video. Start in minutes with premade templates, train on your data, deploy everywhere. Operates in 90+ languages. Try free for 30 days!

name: Music Videos by Mozart
tagline: Chat ‚Üí Song ‚Üí Music Video ‚Üí Publish
description: Mozart AI now lets you generate sixty second music videos to bring visual resonance to your sonic creations. We're also launching Vibe Sessions ‚Äî a conversational journey from idea ‚Üí finished song ‚Üí short music video. For deeper control, jump into a Studio Session for multitrack editing, clean stem generation, effects, MIDI, and more.

name: GPT-5.2
tagline: Frontier model for professional work and long-running agents
description: GPT‚Äë5.2 is designed to unlock even more economic value for people; it‚Äôs better at creating spreadsheets, building presentations, writing code, perceiving images, understanding long contexts, using tools, and handling complex, multi-step projects.

name: Google Mixboard 2.0
tagline: Now w/ Nano Banana Pro, new file types & multi-board project
description: Mixboard just got a major tune-up! Create presentations from your boards with Nano Banana Pro, support for new file types including PDF / HEIC / TIFF, multi-board projects and more. A faster, smoother way to explore ideas and turn boards into polished outputs.

name: Vibary
tagline: What if every book was a unique website?
description: Vibary presents each book as a unique webpage, showcasing its vibe, manifested through vibe coding.

name: VibeCSS
tagline: AI Design Agent for Google Chrome
description: The fastest way to prototype and experiment with web design directly on live pages. Select any element, describe what you want in plain language, and watch AI instantly apply CSS changes. No code required. No dev tools needed. Just pure creative flow.

name: Buildstash
tagline: Organize, share, and distribute your software binaries
description: Store and organize software binaries for any platform, with super accessible binary management which connects with the tools you already use. Whether you're working on mobile or desktop apps, games, or embedded - use Buildstash to share binaries securely with your team or with testers, guide builds through custom workflows, and distribute to users.

name: LoadFast
tagline: A text Expander for Mac - type 3 keys, expand 300 words
description: System-wide text expansion for Mac. Type a shortcut, expand into paragraphs instantly. Works in every app, including emails, Slack, Notion, VS Code, Terminal, Ghostty, ChatGPT, and Arc. Syncs with Chrome extension and web app. üéÅ PH Special: $50 lifetime (intro price, going up to $197). No subscriptions ever.

name: Cruise Pirate
tagline: The first AI native travel agency that sells cruises
description: Cruise Pirate is a full stack AI travel agency. Today, 70% of all cruises are still sold through human travel agents. Cruise Pirate AI powered search and clean checkout UI aims to make it easier for the end consumer to directly book their cruise.

name: Mass Unfollow for X ( Twitter )
tagline: Unfollow inactive, spam, or unwanted X accounts in seconds
description: Efficiently unfollow accounts on X (Twitter) with our powerful Chrome extension. Start with a free account or choose a plan that fits your needs. Built for creators, founders, and power users who want a clean feed without wasting hours manually unfollowing. Bulk Unfollow: Remove hundreds of accounts with 1 click. Smart Filters: Detect inactive, spam, bots, and low-engagement accounts. Privacy-Friendly: Runs locally inside your browser‚Äîyour data stays with you.

name: Deskmark
tagline: Add watermark to desktop
description: Deskmark is a native macOS app that lets you add text and icon watermarks to your desktop, making it easy to use while recording videos. You can tile image and text watermarks across the desktop and customize their angle, text size, icon, spacing, and text color for a personalized watermark setup.

name: Agent Starter Pack
tagline: Production Agents in Google Cloud in Minutes
description: Ship AI Agents to Google Cloud in minutes, not months. Production-ready templates with built-in CI/CD, evaluation, and observability. - GoogleCloudPlatform/agent-starter-pack

name: ByteFlow
tagline: Build AI powered workflows & launch products in minutes.
description: Byteflow brings UI, backend, and AI automation together in one place, so anyone can build full products in minutes. Unlike tools that handle only workflows or only UI, Byteflow combines 100+ MCP actions and 600+ connectors with orchestration, super agents, voice commands, and autonomous execution. It‚Äôs the fastest way to turn ideas into real apps, no stitching tools, no coding complexity. Just build ‚Üí run ‚Üí scale.

name: ScaliQ
tagline: The LinkedIn AI Outreach Agent for Real Conversations
description: ScaliQ lets you scale LinkedIn outreach across multiple accounts from one unified inbox ‚Äî with AI agents that handle DMs, follow-ups, replies. It analyzes every response, applies qualification tags, and keeps the conversation moving until a prospect is ready for you.

name: Lynksurf
tagline: AI that boosts your LinkedIn engagement instantly
description: LynkSurf is an AI-powered Chrome extension that transforms LinkedIn into a smart, context-aware workspace. It analyzes profiles, drafts comments, enhances posts, and creates personalized connection messages ‚Äî all directly inside LinkedIn. No tab switching. No copy-paste. Just fast, intelligent engagement

name: CutMe Short
tagline: Smarter short links for growing brands
description: CutMe Short is a smart URL management platform built for growing brands. Create branded short links, dynamic UTMs, QR codes, and link rotators ‚Äî all backed by powerful analytics and GA4 tracking. Streamline your campaigns, stay organized, and turn every click into actionable insights.

name: POSTAUTOPSY
tagline: The brutally honest LinkedIn coach.
description: Roast your LinkedIn post. Autopsy it. Fix it. Repeat.
